QuestData.Title: Beating the Market
QuestData.Description: <It's not hard to see why the Foebreaker is behind schedule. Every other day, a foreman comes in and changes the blueprints.>$B$B<Most troubling are the recent alterations. The workers have been ordered to remove rivets to save on costs!>$B$B<You'd better track down one of the Bilgewater foremen responsible for this and make an example out of him, before any Horde lives are lost in a faulty ship.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Track down a Bilgewater Foreman somewhere in Bilgewater Harbor and knock him around a little.
QuestData.RewardText: So they were trying to skimp on production costs? Unacceptable!$B$BI'm glad you knocked some sense into them. If that foreman makes good on his word, our fleet will be ship-shape in time for the invasion.
